variables.variable: from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") time=s["ElapsedTime"]["value"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") air_y_velocity_max=s["Air"]["Velocity%2"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") water_y_velocity_max=s["Water"]["Velocity%2"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") particle_reynolds_number_max=s["Air"]["ParticleReynoldsNumber"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") particle_reynolds_number_min=s["Air"]["ParticleReynoldsNumber"]["min"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") divergence_max = s["Air"]["SumVelocityDivergence"]["max"][-1]
import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") air_vol_frac_integ=s["Air"]["PhaseVolumeFraction"]["integral"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") k_max = s["Water"]["TurbulentKineticEnergy"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("bubcol_2d_rans.stat") epsilon_max = s["Water"]["TurbulentDissipation"]["max"][-1]

test.name: Program ran to completion till 120 s
Maximum Air velocity is less than 0.62 at 120 s
Maximum Water velocity is less than 0.23 at 120 s
Maximum ParticleReynoldsNumber is less than 2050 at the 120 s
Minimum ParticleReynoldsNumber is greater than 750 at the 120 s
Maximum turbulent kinetic energy is less than 0.016 at the 120 s
Maximum turbulent dissipation rate is less than 0.032 at the 120 s
SumVelocityDivergence is less than 1e-10 at 120 s
